mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER_BOARD ( CATEGORY_CODE, CUS_NO, MEMBER_ID, CUS_BOARD_TITLE, CUS_BOARD_CONTENT, CUS_BOARD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{category_code}, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(CUS_NO),0)+1 FROM CUSTOMER_BOARD ), #{member_id}, #{cus_board_title}, #{cus_board_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT CUS_NO, MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY_CODE, CUS_BOARD_TITLE, CUS_BOARD_CONTENT, CUS_BOARD_DATE FROM ( SELECT CUS_NO, MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY_CODE, CUS_BOARD_TITLE, CUS_BOARD_CONTENT, CUS_BOARD_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CUS_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM CUSTOMER_BOARD) mp WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{rowEnd, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY CUS_NO DESC
SELECT CUS_NO, MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY_CODE, CUS_BOARD_TITLE, CUS_BOARD_CONTENT, CUS_BOARD_DATE FROM CUSTOMER_BOARD WHERE CUS_NO = #{cus_no}
SELECT COUNT(CUS_NO) FROM CUSTOMER_BOARD WHERE CUS_NO > 0
